volunteer_wait_for_task: We received your application. We will assign you to a team based on your avalaibility. We will send you and email, and your Task will apprear below.
title: Title
name: Name
create_volunteer_profile: Help us to co-create this amazing event. Fill the volunteering form by clicking on the **+** sign
user_help:
This website allows you to give us you Avalaibility to help co-organinzing this event and to propose some amazing performance

- to Volunteer, first fill the form to let us know when you are available and how your want to help
- to Perform, please fill the performance form. Please try to be comprehensive as possible to speed up the application process

We will notify by email about your shift as volunteer. All your shifts will be availabe here. As performer, we'll get in touch with
you. You can follow the state of your application on this website.

Thanks You for being part of this amazing event.
performance_wait_for_answer: We are considering your application. We'll get in touch soon.
volunteer_has_task: Thank you for volunteering. We have assigned you a shift. You will get in contact with you with all relevant information. The Area Ref the person to conctact for all questions about your tasks.
